Most women are monitored for increasing blood pressure during antenatal visits. Preventive 
measures may assist in the prevention of prenatal complications and adverse outcomes for 
women at increased risk of hypertensive disorders, such as those with multiple pregnancies, 
older age or increased BMI ( 192). Calcium supplements may reduce the chance of developing 
pre-eclampsia, especially in high-risk women, as well as those who do not consume sufficient
